statements: SELECT * FROM Table1;
SELECT name, age FROM Table1 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Table1 WHERE age > 25;
SELECT id, name FROM Table1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM Table1 WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM Table1 WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, age FROM Table1 WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT name, age, timestamp FROM Table1 WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM users;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.name, o.total_amount FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id;
SELECT u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM users u LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_name, order_date, product_name FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM table1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, quantity, price FROM table2 WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT created_at, modified_at FROM table3 WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT order_id, status FROM table4 WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM table1 ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC
SELECT id, name FROM table2 WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM table3 GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT MAX(quantity), MIN(quantity) FROM table4
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, name FROM table2 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT id, quantity FROM table3 WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, total_amount FROM table4 WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, address FROM table5 WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM table1 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM table1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT table2.id, table2.user_id, table1.name FROM table2 JOIN table1 ON table2.user_id = table1.id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM table3;
SELECT * FROM table4 WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
